epics.title: Entity Model v2
epics.description: Complete rewrite of data model, types, store, routes, tools, and UI
epics.ai_summary: Entity model v2 refactor complete. 14 entity types defined, data migrated, store rewritten, 7 new route files, AI tools updated, UI overhauled. Foundation for enterprise-grade PM.

epics.title: AI Intelligence Engine
epics.description: The core AI product: chat agent with full tool access, multi-provider model routing, memory/caching, and eventually background agents. This is the engine that makes DevTrack intelligent.
epics.ai_summary: The chat-first architecture: AI chat agent is the product. Multi-provider routing (OpenAI/Anthropic/Google), ~40 tools, SSE streaming. Memory caching and background agents are next-tier extensions.

epics.title: Automation & Self-Healing
epics.description: DevTrack manages itself: file watcher, session lifecycle, self-audits, automation engine hardening. The system that ensures nothing falls through the cracks.
epics.ai_summary: Structural enforcement over passive instructions. File watcher, session lifecycle, self-audits, dedup, conversation logging. The fix for AI context drift (ISS-006).

epics.title: UI & Views
epics.description: Everything the user sees: design polish, new views (analytics, activity log), global search, view modes. Linear-inspired aesthetic with clean information density.
epics.ai_summary: Design overhaul (Lucide icons, tight spacing), analytics dashboard, activity log, global search. The visualization layer that makes DevTrack's intelligence visible.

epics.title: Data Integrity & Trust
epics.description: Knowing who did what: entity provenance (User/DevTrack AI/External attribution), data archival, audit trails. The foundation for trusting AI-managed data.
epics.ai_summary: Three-label attribution (User, DevTrack AI, External) on all mutations. Auto-archival of stale data. The trust layer that makes autonomous AI operations acceptable.

epics.title: Platform & Distribution
epics.description: Making DevTrack a product: CLI tooling, project initialization, context sync across AI platforms, and eventually paid product launch with daemon + web platform.
epics.ai_summary: npx dev-track init → scan codebase → AI infers systems → context sync to Cursor/Claude/Copilot. Then: paid tiers, daemon + web platform, teams.

epics.title: Codebase Intelligence
epics.description: Understanding the code: living wiki docs, auto-generated documentation, structured annotations, codebase visualization improvements.
epics.ai_summary: Living project wiki, auto-generated docs from codebase changes, structured annotations for rich tooltips. Making the codebase self-documenting.

epics.title: Automation Audits - Full Transparency into AI Operations
epics.description: End-to-end audit system: data capture pipeline that records every step of automation runs (thinking chain, tool calls, changes, suggestions, cost), persistent storage with indexing, API routes, rich UI with filters/detail/analytics, and suggestion approval workflow.
epics.ai_summary: Complete audit system delivered: data model, storage layer with per-run files + index, AuditRecorder class for agent instrumentation, engine wiring with change detection, API routes (list/get/stats/suggestions), rich UI with expandable run cards showing thinking chain/tool calls/changes/suggestions, and AI tools for chat agent queries. 7/8 items completed (88% progress). Only audits-tab parent item remains in_progress. Foundation for full automation transparency and trust.
